content: I took text team training on 8/24, and then got on Discord, completed the required form, passed the quiz, and signed up on Scale To Win. Everything was done by 8/26, and I understand I would be notified when I was cleared to begin sending out texts within two days, but I haven’t heard from anyone yet. Just checking to see if I missed something. I’d like to begin contributing to the campaign. Thanks.
HI <@1277052348237352962> it looks like you did everything perfectly. The text team will likely notify you tomorrow.
<@1277052348237352962>  Please check your Discord DMs, I'll share an update. <:thankyou:1252806147396735057> <:blueheart:1252803082849488956>
